attributes.additional_details: The British government is complicit in making billions of pounds from the addiction to gambling & have even awarded honours to those responsible for creating addicts. Self regulation in the industry has not been effective in combatting the enormous rise in gambling, especially online & young people.  Current legislation does nothing to prevent the deluge of gambling advertising & self regulation appears to rely solely on addicts being expected to regulate their own addiction!
attributes.background: To ban all gambling related advertising as with tobacco to help stem the tide of gambling addiction sweeping this country!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Ban the advertisement of gambling websites and apps: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557212

Ban gambling advertisements on television and radio: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548310
